text: José Mariano de Salas (11 May 1797 – 24 December 1867) was a Mexican soldier and politician who served twice as interim president of Mexico, once in 1846, during the Mexican American War, and once in 1859 during the War of Reform. Category:1797 births Category:1867 deaths Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:Politicians from Mexico City
title: José Mariano Salas
